review_data.title: Pop up
review_data.content: We stopped for a couple of coffees as we were waiting for a train. Good Latte Macchiatos, but not very warm. Interesting location.

review_data.title: Too expensive
review_data.content: Small plates, way too expensive for what you get. Not the same menu as in 2017 when we were going regularly. We will not go again.

review_data.title: Cool pop-up bar and bistro
review_data.content: We came for some drinks and sweets to this lovely place in the heart of Sihlcity. Service personnel was very friendly and helpful. Coffees, drinks and "Chia Pudding" tasted great so we ordered another round. All self service and with warm colors and ambience. Unfortunately...More

review_data.title: Coole Open-Air Pop-Up-Beiz mit feiner Küche (nur Juni&Juli 2017!)
review_data.content: Zusammenfassung: cooles Open-Air Pop-Up-Beiz Konzept mit feiner Küche auf dem zentralen Platz im Einkaufszentrum Sihlcity. Würde ich das Restaurant Freunden...More
